trans-unit.source: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a scalar property.

The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.
The EdmScalarPropertyAttribute links a scalar property on a data class to a property of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the conceptual model.
This attribute is applied to properties that return scalar types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.
Because an entity key can contain more than one property, the EntityKeyProperty can be set to true for more than one property of an entity type.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and EntityKeyProperty properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.
The value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property can have a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value.
The IsNullable and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true`.
The value that indicates whether the property can have a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value.
